mapper.select: select seq ,pic ,isFavorite ,honorific ,lastName ,middleName ,firstName ,appellation ,naverId ,nickname ,memo from addressbook where 1=1 order by seq asc
select seq ,pic ,isFavorite ,honorific ,lastName ,middleName ,firstName ,appellation ,naverId ,nickname ,memo from addressbook where 1=1 and seq = #{seq} order by seq asc
